oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Union at Night
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Union Avenue; streets; H-M Parts Company; Esso; gas stations;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Lights shine on Union Ave. on a rainy night. Businesses shown include: HM Parts Company (tractor supplies), an Esso station, a Gulf station and an ice cream stand.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Poland
